- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Daniel, You are very welcome. I look forward to keeping in touch as well. Feel free to reach out at any time. Take care!___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Daniel Verizon [mailto:dpforrester@verizon.net] Sent: Wednesday, March 28, 2012 7:45 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Call Follow Up Many thanks for your time. Look forward to keeping in touch. Best DF
Sent from my iPhone On Mar 27, 2012, at 4:38 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote:Dear Daniel , It was a pleasure speaking with you. Youll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here. · http://www.xcelhr.com/ - a PEO service you may find useful. Our contact there is David Flook david.flook@xcelhr.com 800-776-0076 ( mention MBO refferred you) · http://www.tie-inc.com/ <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> - our insurance broker  contact information below (mention MBO referred you) Michael Cronin, CLCS Account Executive, Commercial Lines THE INSURANCE EXCHANGE, INC. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.tie-inc.com/doc.asp?id=9&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf0FfulVk7u%2BNJ7vNiTDSc4KntfJzDOOMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> 9713 Key West Ave., Suite #401 Rockville, MD 20850 (800)346-1403 (toll free) (301)545-1579 (direct (301)330-1270 (fax) Cronin.M@Tie-Inc.com We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here. I will follow up with you promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
